issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: AliyunOSS: Support Assume Roles in AliyunOSS

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HADOOP-15992 reverted 2 patches, however, those two patches contain bug fixes, we should bring them back

[~weiweiyagn666] The patch is ok now. Pls help to review, thanks.

Hi [~wujinhu]

Yes, I checked the guava library, seems like the latest API doesn't expect the list returned by *allAsList* to be modified, ** it makes sense to create a modifiable copy. +1. Will commit this shortly.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #15718 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/15718/])
HADOOP-16030. AliyunOSS: bring fixes back from HADOOP-15671. Contributed (wwei: rev f87b3b11c46704dcdb63089dd971e2a5ba1deaac)

I just committed this to trunk, cherry-picked to branch-2, branch-2.9, branch-3.0, branch-3.1 and branch-3.2. Thanks for the contribution [~wujinhu].
